content: the pattern of this marigold remembrance flower will produce a flower you can use to embellish anything you like it uses simple stitches anyone who crochetes can do there are photo s in the pattern to show you the steps in a more visual way the most used colour is ofcourse a saffran or ocre colourway but feel free to use anything you have it doesn t require a lot of yarn gauge is not that important i used some fingering baby yarn use whatever you have and the appropriate crochet hook
